com.devbliss.doctest.utils

Class FileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devbliss.doctest.utils.FileHelper

  • public class FileHelper
extends Object
    Defines some general methods to write a file and defines its name. Each ReportRenderer must use this class to write the file and build its correct name.
    Author:
    bmary

      void writeFile(String nameCompletePath, String finalDoc)
      This writes out the file and retries if some other task has locked the file.

        public void writeFile(String nameCompletePath,

        This writes out the file and retries if some other task has locked the file. This could cause a StackOverflowException, but I cannot think of any real case where this happens...
